tag_list: xerox, acs, transportation, intelligent-transportation, variable-pricing, congestion-management, electronic, open-road, toll-collection, hot-lanes, express-lanes
overview:
As Vice President of Business Development for the ACS Transportation Solutions Group, Parker Williams has over 25 years of public and private sector transportation experience.

Williams is responsible for ACS/Xerox revenue synergy opportunities in North America across all lines of business including electronic toll collection, motor vehicle services, parking and safety solutions, and public transit fare collection and fleet management. He serves on the Education Task Force of the International Bridge, Tunnel and Turnpike Association and is also Vice President of Education and Chair of the Transportation Institute for the National Council for Public Private Partnerships.

Williams has served as Administrator of the Maryland State Highway Administration, as well as Deputy Secretary of Administration with the Pennsylvania Department of Transportation.
